pulpMd --target=input.md --output=output.md
cmp output.md output.golden.md

-- input.md --
### Here's an example:

{{snippet SampleCode [js]}}

### Here's an example second time:

{{snippet SampleCode [js]}}

-- SampleCode.js --
function SampleFunction() {
  console.log("Show in markdown");
}

-- output.golden.md --
### Here's an example:

```js
function SampleFunction() {
  console.log("Show in markdown");
}
```

### Here's an example second time:

```js
function SampleFunction() {
  console.log("Show in markdown");
}
```
